ai-pli-tv-pvr1.4:1.1_0: While they’ve sexual intercourse, how many kinds of offenses do many different things?
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.4:1.2_0: While having sexual intercourse, he commits three kinds of offenses:
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.4:1.3_0: If there were the attainment of the serious offense, but because of wrong conduct, for the attainment of the serious offenses.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.4:2.1_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, defecate, urinates, or spits in water, How many ways?
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.4:2.2_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spits in water, with a single effort, because of disrespect, then for everyone to commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.4:2.3_0: and because of the noble ones,
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.4:3.1_0: The fourth section consisting of being inclusive is finished.
